author: Staff Reporter
text:
Sree Saraswathi Thyagaraja College, Pollachi, will conduct a seminar on ‘Emerging Trends in Personal Financial Management’ on February 26 and 27. A release says that the importance of the topic could be understood by looking at household savings for 2013-14 which stood at Rs. 20,651.79 billion.

Personal financial planning was one of the most important tools in solving most of the problems in one’s personal life. It also addresses the nation’s development needs. To discuss this and much more the college had organised the seminar, the release adds.
title: TAMIL NADU
